title: Are Refugee Tuberculosis Rates in San Diego ‘More Than 100 Times Greater’ Than the National Average?
subtitle: A California scientist told us that Breitbart's story on his team's 2013 study was "not an accurate use" of the information.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: A study determined that the active tuberculosis incidence rate for refugees in San Diego was more than 100 times higher than it was in the rest of the United States.
